text: Medamulana Walawwa (also known as Medamulana) is a walawwa in Beliatta, Hambantota District, Sri Lanka. It was the home of Don David Rajapaksa, the Vidane Arachchi of the Ihala Valikada Korale. His son D. A. Rajapaksa became a State Councillor for Hambantota and a Member of Parliament, who represented the Beliatta electorate. His son Mahinda Rajapaksa served as President of Sri Lanka from 2005 to 2015. As such it has become the political seat of the Rajapaksa family.Mahinda, the humanistMahinda the grandson of Ruhunu Lions ==See also== *Woodlands, Colombo == References == Category:Rajapaksa family Category:Country houses in Sri Lanka Category:Houses in Hambantota District
title: Medamulana Walawwa
